content.question: The excerpt could best be used by historians studying which of the following?

choices.label: What prevented European powers from supporting the South
What motivated African Americans during the war
How Lincoln used executive powers to initiate wartime policy
How Confederate strategy prevented a rapid Union victory

content.answer: How Lincoln used executive powers to initiate wartime policy

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
